item.description:
Get ready for some social and team-focused game play with a night of Party Games.

Examples of party games include:

  • Balderdash
  • Catch Phrase
  • Taboo
  • Celebrity
  • Werewolves
  • Cranium
  • Pictionary
  • Scattagories

So if you like any of these games or want to learn more about this genre, this event will be for you.  We welcome new players with open arms.

Our game closet is stocked, but if you have a new or favorite game, please feel free to bring it, especially if you got this this holiday season.

You are welcome to bring a favorite snack for the evening. We'll have plenty to drink.

* You should know that we are a household with a cat, but he will be locked up for the evening. The house is also home to two small children, who will hopefully be in bed by the event start time, but either may make an appearance during the night.

* Parking is available on Upham Street, but it is tight. There is generally more parking available toward Orne St., and more parking is available on Orne and Dearborn Streets.

*In the event of a snow emergency, this event will be cancelled.

group.name: The Salem Board Games Meetup Group

item.name: Party Game Night in Salem
